page.title: 07TRANSPORT (1)
page.content:
{ LINK ROAD AND TRAFFIC { The{North Devon link road}was built to stop so much traffic going through Halberton so it would be safer for old and young people to cross roads.When we did our traffic survey in a 20 minute period on the link road and in Halberton we found out that there were more vehicles going through Halberton than on the Link road.This means that the link road is not in full action or it might not work as the council planned . Most of the local people agree with the link road and most of them said there was more air pollution before the link road was open in 1984. {MOTOR WAY
The{M5 Motorway}is heavily used by holidaymakers from London,South Wales
